core:processNote.core:description: These exit codes reflect success but with a restart required. For a full list see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa376931(v=vs.85).aspx
Executed if the enactor.applicationUpdater.StopServices parameter is set
Executed if the enactor.applicationUpdater.DeleteServices parameter is set
If the enactor.applicationUpdater.InstallerParameters parameter is set, use them
If the installer parameters don't contain defaults, add them
Executed if the enactor.applicationUpdater.KillProcessName parameter is set
Executed if the enactor.applicationUpdater.InstallBootstrapFiles parameter is set to true and the enactor.applicationUpdater.ApplicationDir parameter is also set
Allows users to include hook scripts and custom-libs in an AU
Allows execution of an autoexec.bat file that does more complex stuff

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: concatenate("%WINDIR%\\system32\\msiexec /i ", escapedTempDir, "\\", mSIFilename," /L*V ", escapedHomeDir, "\\logs\\EnactorMSIUpgrade-", timestamp, ".log /quiet TARGETDIR=", escapedDrive, " ", installerParameters)
